device_provisioned.message: デバイスがプロビジョニングされています
device_provisioned.description: Describes the status to the device's provisioning state

device_not_provisioned.message: デバイスがプロビジョニングされていません
device_not_provisioned.description: Describes the status to the device's provisioning state

valid_token.description: Describes the current state of the token on the app

no_valid_token.message: 有効なトークンがありません
no_valid_token.description: Describes the current state of the token on the app

connected_to_server.message: サーバーに接続しています
connected_to_server.description: Describes the current state of the connection between the app and the socket server

not_connected_to_server.message: サーバーに接続していません
not_connected_to_server.description: Describes the current state of the connection between the app and the socket server

ip_address_restriction.description: Error message displayed to the user when their IP address is outside the permitted range

client_offline.message: クライアントはオフラインです
client_offline.description: Error message displayed to the user that their device is not connected to the Internet.

provisioning_data_incomplete.message: プロビジョニング・データが不完全です
provisioning_data_incomplete.description: Error message displayed to the user that the provisioning data returned from the server is incomplete.

provisioning_server_error_code.message: プロビジョニング・エンドポイントの呼び出し中にエラーが発生しました。サーバーがステータス {error_code} を返しました {additional_information}
provisioning_server_error_code.description: Displayed to the user when the server returns an error doing provisioning. '{error_code}' is replaced by a numerical error code from the server and should not be localized. '{additional_information}' will be replaced by a localized explanation of the error.

provisioning_server_error_no_additional_.message: 利用可能な追加情報はありません。
provisioning_server_error_no_additional_.description: Displayed when the provisioning error code is something unexpected.

provisioning_server_error_additional_inf.message: プロビジョニング ウィンドウが閉じている可能性があります。
provisioning_server_error_additional_inf.description: Message to the user of a possible explanation as to why the error occurred.

provisioning_server_error_insufficient_l.message: この組織は、クライアント ライセンスが不足しています。
provisioning_server_error_insufficient_l.description: Message to the user that the customer has no licenses left.

provisioning_server_error_resource_not_f.message: リソースが見つかりません。
provisioning_server_error_resource_not_f.description: Message to the user that the requested org was not founnd.

active_hours_restriction.message: アクティブな時間帯の制限。{reconnect_time} に再接続しています
active_hours_restriction.description: Displayed to the user when they attempt to connect outside of specified hours. '{reconnect_time}' is replaced by a date and time of the next reconnect attempt and should not be localized.

token_retrieval_error.message: トークンの取得中にエラーが発生しました。ステータス: {status}
token_retrieval_error.description: Displayed to the user when there was an error retrieving the token from the server. '{status}' is replaced by a numerical error code from the server and should not be localized.

token_auth_error.message: ソケット・サーバーから authError を受信しました: {error}
token_auth_error.description: Displayed to the user when an error has occurred with the security token. '{error}' is replaced by a error description from the server and should not be localized.

your_teacher.description: Default title used to reference the teacher.

allow_monitoring.description: User makes this selection in the context menu to allow the teacher to monitor their device.

provisioned_to_catchall_org.message: このデバイスは現在、有効な組織にプロビジョニングされていません。 デバイスをプロビジョニングする方法を学ぶ。
provisioned_to_catchall_org.description: Displayed to end user when the catch-all org is used in device provisioning.

default_my_first_class_localized.description: The localized name of the first class when an org is first created

org_invalid.message: 指定された組織を検証できませんでした。
org_invalid.description: The organization could not be validated.

dead_org_titlebar_title.description: Title of titlebar for dialog box indicating this is a dead org.
